name: Endless Fox Dash
description:
Take control of a fox and run through all the different enviroments while evading and defeating an increasingly difficult array of unique enemies. 

Main Features 

  • 8 different enviroments to explore
  • Lots of different enemies, each with their own ways of being defeated
  • Combo bar to help increase your score faster

Controls

  • Space - Jump
  • Left mouse button - Attack

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated :)
